name: Dapper - Major Mike’s Shade - Toro
additionalNotes: The Major Mike’s Shade cigar brand is a budget-friendly released by the Dapper Cigar Co. The cigars are named after, Ian Reith’s (the brand’s founder) father, Michael Reith, who served in the Air Force and was fond of shade cigars. The blend features a smooth, Ecuadorian Connecticut wrapper placed over a Honduran binder and mixed-filler leaves. The cigars are handmade in Nicaragua.
